articles.description: Country and R&B stars Eric Church and Jazmine Sullivan teamed up Sunday for one of the more unusual wrinkles in Super Bowl national anthem history, and something Frances Scott Key probably scarcely imagined: a duet. That didn’t turn out to be the only extraor…

articles.author: Tambay Obenson
articles.title: ‘The Equalizer’ Review: Queen Latifah’s Return to Scripted TV Should Land with CBS Demo, but No Further - IndieWire
articles.description: She becomes only the fifth Black woman to headline an hour-long broadcast network drama. Too bad it had to be such a formulaic retread.
articles.content: In CBS’ New York City-set re-imagining of the 1980s series “The Equalizer,” starring the late Edward Woodward as the stoic menace with a populist message, multi-hyphenate Queen Latifah plays Robyn Mc… [+7216 chars]
